dict.acceptation: 立刻，马上；向右，右边；恰当地；一直；
右方的；正确的；合适的；好的，正常的；
正确，正当；右边；权利；右手；
纠正；扶直，使正；整理；补偿；

sent.orig: The word "right"and "write" are spelt differently but they are pronounced the same.
sent.trans: “right”和“write”两字的拼法不同，但发音相同。

sent.orig: Beneficial Right: Personal Right? Real Right? Or New Right?
sent.trans: 信托受益权：物权？债权？抑或新权利？

sent.orig: Express yourself at the right time right place, with the right words and the right attitude.
sent.trans: 在适当的时间和地点，用适当的言辞和态度表达自己。

sent.orig: Thus these three right view right effort, & right mindfulness -- run & around right speech.
sent.trans: 因此正见、正精进和正念这三个心所运行和环绕正语。

sent.orig: Thus these three qualities-right view, right effort, & right mindfulness-run & circle around right action.
sent.trans: 如是彼有此等之三法，随从、随转于正业，谓：正见、正精进、正念。
